title: Magnolia Matching Swags
description:
Magnolia Matching Swags
25" long
These matching magnolia swags are simply beautiful!  They would be perfect if you have two doors or if you have two windows or sconces on either side of your front door.  It would also be perfect indoors around a fireplace or a large doorway. Or maybe you can use one on your front door and the other on the back door. You can choose! Each swag has magnolia flowers, small white & peach colored daisies, and a ton of beautiful greenery. A burlap ribbon runs all the way through the swag, along with burlap & lace ribbon tails. These are perfect from spring to summer.
*price is for both

#spring #springdecor #wreathmaker #twinfolkswreaths #magnolia #swags #summerdecor #daisies #everydaywreath

title: Merry Christmas from the Grinch Christmas Wreath
description:
Merry Christmas from the Grinch Christmas Wreath 
Approx 30" across
This is the perfect wreath for your Grinchmas decor! It's a very full deco mesh wreath with all kinds of fun accents, including: oversized lollipops, ornament sprays, mesh tubing, ribbon tails, glittery beaded sprays, swirl picks and green tinsel swirls. At the center is a wooden sign with the green guy himself wishing all your friends and neighbors a Merry Christmas! 

#twinfolkswreaths #wreathmaker #christmaswreath #holidaydecor #wreath #christmasdecor #grinchmas #GrinchVibes #grinchchristmas #decomeshwreath

title: Summer Fun In Red, White & Blue Wreath
description:
Summer Fun Wreath! Red, White & Blue... BellðŸ˜‰
26" across
Have a red, white & blue summer with this beauty! It will just simply sparkle on your front door all summer long. It's a FULL deco mesh wreath with ribbon tails throughout. Along the perimeter I've placed glittery curls. At the center is the circle metal sign, framed out with a sparkling red & blue heart, showing off the love of ice cream in the summer. The wreath is exploding with red sparklers, ice cream treats and flip flops. Do not let this gorgeous wreath be sold to someone else! 

#twinfolkswreaths #wreathmaker #wreath #decomeshwreath #summerwreath #wreaths #redwhiteandblue #icecream #icecreamdecor #summervibes #summerdecor

title: THIS ITEM IS SOLD!
description:
Beetlejuice Themed Halloween Swag & Garland 
Swag: 42" long 
Garland: 9'
I LOVE THIS SO MUCH! This labor of love turned SO great. The perfect Halloween decor for the Tim Burton fan. It's a great way to celebrate the new movie coming out as well. It has mesh ribbons, black & white burlap ribbon, the iconic black & white stripe ribbon, with accents in purple & lime green. I hand made all the green hairy baubles as an homage to his green crazy hair. Be the absolute envy of your neighbors with this one of a kind Beetlejuice Halloween decor. 

#twinfolkswreaths #wreathmaker #wreath 
#Halloween #Beetlejuice #beetlejuicedecor #timburtonstyle #halloweendecor #Garland #swag #beetlejuicebeetlejuice

title: Mardi Gras Masquerade Ball Wreath
description:
Mardi Gras Masquerade Ball Wreath 
Approx 25" across 30" long
Mardi Gras is one of my favorite seasons in my wreath making. This gorgeous wreath brings out all the opulence that comes when you let the good times roll! This is an evergreen base that I shaped into an oval. It is covered with all of the gold, green and purple deco mesh curls I could fit on it. This beauty has ribbon tails and bows, party picks, gold embellished ornaments, gold picks and two sparkling peacocks nestled within. The star of the wreath, of course, is the Venetian inspired jester mask. If you think this wreath looks great in these pictures get ready to be amazed when you see it in person. Be the complete envy of the neighborhood with this breathtaking Mardi Gras wreath. 

#wreathmaker #wreath #Mardigras #mardigrasneworleans #Mardigraswreath #peacock #venetianmask #nola #mardigrasglamore #letthegoodtimesroll #twinfolkswreaths
